title: something preventing me from patching ( error 003)
body: anyone know how to fix this ? it wont let me log in. ive been waiting for 2 days. this sucks

replies.body:
Usually Error Code 003 points to a connection issue, which can be caused by a few things. 

I'd first start off with configuring your [firewall](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#wq3). From there, if that doesn't work, then let's try either switching to a [public DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#wq5) or [release/renew IP and flushing your DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#wq10).

Those are the first few things that could help with that issue, but if those steps don't work, it might be better to reach out to our Tech team by sending them a [ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). From there, we can take a closer look at the situation and troubleshoot further.
